column1: '''Knocking at the Door''' is the title of [[Index:Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: a poem]] by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], perhaps written in [[1927]]. Subtitled "Lines Induced by Sensation When Waiting for an Answer at the Door of an Exalted Academic Person", the poem was published under the pseudonym Oxymore in  ''[[The Oxford Magazine]]'', vol. 55, no. 13 ([[18 February]] [[1937]]), page 403.

column1: Tolkien later rewrote "Knocking at the Door" and included it as "[[The Mewlips]]" in ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'' in [[1962]].<ref>{{CG
